tool_description: all game available on rawg platform it consists of range of multipe platform like ( steam , gog , epic play store and many more ) RAWG Video Games Database.  games api for multiple platform ( pc, linux, mac, ios, android and many more )
name: RAWG game
title: RAWG game

api_list.name: suggested game
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rawg-game1.p.rapidapi.com/suggested_game/3498"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rawg-game1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rawg-game1.p.rapidapi.com/suggested_game/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rawg-game1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
